content: Hello again, I was wondering if it was possible to compile test and related crates in the rust repo, with the static rlib std as opposed to using the dynamic .so/.dll?
test is compiled as both rlib and dylib. The rlib should link against libstd.rlib as far as I know.
@bjorn3 Right, that makes sense. I'll test just removing the dylib in test. Thanks!
Yep, this worked perfectly. :smile:
